description: Long-sleeved shirt with a relaxed fit and lots of functional details perfect for multifaceted outdoor life. Made of G-1000 Air Stretch for airy comfort and fantastic freedom of movement. Press buttons down the front and an opening in the back yoke with mesh ventilation underneath. Two chest bellows pockets with top-loaded openings under a placket, one with a zippered vertical pocket underneath and one with an inside media pocket. Cuffs with gussets and press button closures. The collar can be turned up and secured in place and also has an extra panel that can be turned up on really sunny days providing additional sun protection for your neck.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Trail Shirt LS - Mens
